levels.description:
Immediately generates <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> for the duration
<@ba.rem>From second activation and on: generates {buildr_s_2[b].cost} DP every {buildr_s_2[b].interval} seconds, and has unlimited duration</>
